data.message: Pls tel me how to do this video and how to customize.. thanks

replies.message: Hey Miranda. You can create your own Year in Review by selecting “See Your Year” from the top of your News Feed. You can also access your Year in Review by viewing a friend's Year in Review on their Timeline or by visiting facebook.com/yearinreview. After you've created your Year in Review, scroll down and click customize to change which moments are included. From there you can add or remove photos, change the text that appears with your photos, and add new sections to your Year in Review. -Hailey
